Front-end Developer

Hi! I am looking for a company who will help me to develop my skills and use my knowledge obtained during my education and private courses. I do not have a commercial experience yet but I work on private projects and spend my free time for coding. I am highly interested in front-end technologies. I am ambitious, quick learner, highly motiavted to grow my career. I am currently working on my PWA which is based on my project called WorldWide, then I am going to build full PWA, with native mobile functions.

My projects

WorldWide

WorldWide is the application, which allows to user serach for interesting information about a particular city. Thanks to the connection with external APIs, user can view photos, explore maps and check the upcoming events. Interesting features: VanillaJS autocomplete form, Photo gallery with slider, AJAX, MVC, RWD.

 live

 github

toRead.com

toRead.com is a place where user can find the latest news on selected topics. The application was extened with the "liking" system, which allows to save and read favourite news after collecting the minimum of five "likes".

 live
